Title: Object: Ptolémée
Series: Les sept merveilles du monde
Description: Ptolemy, standing full-length in the foreground, with sceptre in right hand; in the background, at left, the lighthouse (pharos) of Alexandria, a spiral-shaped building standing on a rocky promontory; after Vignon. c.1639/40 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: From a series of seven plates, see 1894,0611.32 for comment.
Bibliographic references: Duplessis 1859 / Catalogue de l'oeuvre de Abraham Bosse (1469)
Meyer 2004 / L'oeuvre gravé de Gilles Rousselet, graveur parisien du XVIIe siècle: catalogue général avec les reproductions de 405 estampes (162)
Lothe 2008 / L'Oeuvre gravé d'Abraham Bosse graveur parisien du XVIIe siècle (88)
